# PTD Today Year-to-Date Intelligence Brief

## 1) Top Themes
- Political leadership and policy initiatives in New York City
- Tragic fire incident at a Swiss ski resort bar on New Year’s Eve
- New Year celebrations in the Middle East
- Notable political and legal developments involving U.S. figures
- Media focus on high-profile video releases

## 2) Top Stories
- NYC Mayor Mamdani announces a housing agenda via executive orders signaling a new administration focus (Source: Reuters)  
- NYC Mayor Mamdani pledges to implement a democratic socialist agenda (Source: Reuters)  
- Dozens killed and over 100 injured in a deadly fire at a Swiss ski resort bar during New Year’s party (Source: Reuters)  
- Dozens presumed dead in New Year catastrophe at Swiss ski resort, with live scenes broadcast (Source: CNN, Reuters)  
- Middle East marks the start of 2026 with spectacular celebrations (Source: Reuters)  
- Trump makes a striking personal comment in an interview with the Wall Street Journal (Source: CNN)  
- Deposition video of Jack Smith released, likely stirring public and legal interest (Source: CNN)

## 3) Sector Takeaways
- Grid / Renewables: Not enough information in the headlines.  
- Data Centers & AI: Not enough information in the headlines.

## 4) Notable Companies/Regions Mentioned
- New York City, USA (Mayor Mamdani’s political agenda)  
- Swiss ski resort (site of deadly New Year’s fire)  
- Middle East (New Year’s celebrations)  
- Trump and Jack Smith (U.S. political/legal figures)
